hector:role.rdfs:label: Role
hector:role.rdfs:comment: The linguistic or usage role of a given name or term variant.

hector:source.rdfs:label: Source
hector:source.rdfs:comment: A bibliographic or textual source documenting the name, term, or taxation.

hector:sourceText.rdfs:label: Source Text
hector:sourceText.rdfs:comment: Textual citation or excerpt from a source related to the data.

hector:phoneticKey.rdfs:label: Phonetic Key
hector:phoneticKey.rdfs:comment: A phonetic transcription or simplified phonetic form used for matching variant spellings of a commodity or term.

hector:taxation.rdfs:label: Taxation
hector:taxation.rdfs:comment: A taxation charge or rate associated with the commodity, typically linked to a schema.org TaxChargeSpecification.

hector:conversionToGram.rdfs:label: Conversion to Gram
hector:conversionToGram.rdfs:comment: Conversion factor from the historical unit to grams.

hector:historicalTerm.rdfs:label: Historical Term
hector:historicalTerm.rdfs:comment: A historical term or name associated with a unit, commodity, or concept.

hector:unit.rdfs:label: Unit
hector:unit.rdfs:comment: Reference to a unit of measure, typically a QUDT unit.

hector:validFrom.rdfs:label: Valid From
hector:validFrom.rdfs:comment: Year from which the given data, name, or taxation is valid.

hector:validThrough.rdfs:label: Valid Through
hector:validThrough.rdfs:comment: Year until which the given data, name, or taxation is valid.

hector:roleAttestedVariant.rdfs:label: Attested Variant
hector:roleAttestedVariant.rdfs:comment: A variant form of the term attested in historical sources.

hector:roleModernLemma.rdfs:label: Modern Lemma
hector:roleModernLemma.rdfs:comment: The modern standardized or lemma form of a term.

hector:roleArchaicForm.rdfs:label: Archaic Form
hector:roleArchaicForm.rdfs:comment: An archaic or obsolete form of the term.

hector:originPlace.rdfs:label: Origin Place
hector:originPlace.rdfs:comment: The place of origin or provenance of a commodity or term.
